headline: AMD to Report Fiscal Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., July 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AMD (NASDAQ: AMD) announced today that it will report fiscal second quarter 2025 financial results on Tuesday, Aug. 5, 2025, after the market close. Management will conduct a conference call to discuss these results at 5:00 p.m. EDT / 2:00 p.m. PDT. Interested parties are invited to listen to the webcast of the conference call via the AMD Investor Relations website ir.amd.com. AMD also announced it will participate in the following event for

headline: Why Intel Stock Is Jumping Today
summary: Intel is laying off 500 employees from its Oregon fabrication hub as part of a broader plan to cut 20% of its global workforce.  Shares of Intel (NASDAQ: INTC) are spiking on Tuesday, up 6.4% as of 1:13 p.m. ET.  Intel began laying off employees from one of its operational hubs in Oregon as part of its major cost-cutting efforts.

headline: IBM rolls out new chips and servers, aims for simplified AI
summary: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) -International Business Machines on Tuesday announced a new line of data center chips and servers that it says will be more power-efficient than rivals and will simplify the process of rolling out artificial intelligence in business operations.  IBM introduced its new Power11 chips on Tuesday, marking its first major update to its "Power" line of chips since 2020.  These chips have traditionally vied against offerings from Intel and Advanced Micro Devices in data centers, particularly in specialized sectors such as financial services, manufacturing and healthcare.
